title: United States of America

title: United Kingdom
description: Explore the rich academic heritage of the United Kingdom, a hub for prestigious universities, historical learning centers, and a global student body.

title: Canada
description: Dive into Canada's inclusive and innovative education system, known for its top-tier universities, supportive academic environment, and multicultural campuses.
